Package io.luliin.twoshopbackend.service

Class ShoppingListService

java.lang.Object
io.luliin.twoshopbackend.service.ShoppingListService
@Service @Validated public class ShoppingListService extends Object
Service class for handling shopping list related queries, mutations and subscriptions.
Author:
Julia Wigenstedt Date: 2022-01-03
